setting.name: Thread Count
setting.description: The number of threads retrieving move details for local media. A higher number uses more system resources, but can help with slow data providers. Do not set this value higher than 10 threads.

setting.name: Max Timeouts
setting.description: The maximum number of timeouts received from the server before a thread returns an error condition.

setting.name: Timeout Length
setting.description: The base length of time (in milliseconds) for a timeout when connecting to the Movie-XML.com data service.

setting.name: Timeout Increment
setting.description: The amount of time (in milliseconds) added to the timeout limit after each timeout failure. A non-zero value will help when the server is experience a large amount of congestion.
